column4: During the live disk the sound worked but now that I've installed ubuntu 8.04 I don't have any sound and when I double click on the sound icon it says "No volume control GStreamer plugins and/or devices found." How do I get the sound working?

During the live disk the sound worked but now that I've installed ubuntu 8.04 I don't have any sound and when I double click on the sound icon it says "No volume control GStreamer plugins and/or devices found."
